last_episode_to_air.name: The Reunion: Hot Mics and Spicy Drama
last_episode_to_air.overview: The season is marked by tension and drama as old wounds are reopened; as the women confront their past, alliances are tested and rivalries reignited.

name: Basketball Wives
overview: Follow the extraordinary lives of a group of female best friends as they juggle the success and stresses of building businesses, battling groupies, and searching for stability in the unstable arena of being the significant other to a basketball superstar.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Shaunie O'Neal returns to Miami for a night out.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Evelyn throws herself a birthday party; surprise dance routine; Jen struggles with choices about her marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When Jen and Evelyn visit Gloria in Orlando, they have a discussion about infidelity.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Emotions get heated and things quickly take an ugly turn when Gloria defends her sister's role in an alleged scandal involving Shaunie. Meanwhile, Jen and Eric look to solve their marital issues with a new luxury home. Finally, Suzie, Jen, and Royce make a splash when a second run-in with a model turns into an all-out fight on the streets of upscale Miami!

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Suzie's efforts to fix newly-single Evelyn up with a local producer crashes with a thud, but not as fast as the relationship between Royce and Gloria once Royce finds out Gloria's been talking about her behind her back. Evelyn enrolls the girls into a self defense class after one too many groupie run-ins. Fireworks ensue when Gloria and Royce step into the ring and quickly take this self-defense class into an offensive direction!

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jen's upcoming Haiti benefit inspires Royce to invite the girls to make a difference on a personal level at a local soup kitchen, though Evelyn finds her motives suspect. Also, some unexpected tender moments with Eric and Jen further clouds her decision to stay married.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Shaunie returns to Miami to check up on the girls, and galpal Erikka is surprised by lingering feelings when she's reunited with ex-boyfriend and professional basketball player, Rasual Butler.

episodes.name: Episode 8: Season Finale
episodes.overview: t's off to La-la land as Shaunie gives the girls a break from the Miami heat in her new hometown, Los Angeles. But all of them wind up in the hot seat during a season-ending dinner conversation that ends with almost everyone in tears. Will Jen decide to stand by her man or send him to the showers? Can Royce and Gloria get over themselves? Most importantly, has Shaunie really put her issues with Gloria aside?

episodes.name: Episode 9: Reunion Special
episodes.overview: At the Basketball Wives Reunion guest host Tanika Ray helps Evelyn, Jennifer, Royce, Suzie, and Shaunie reminisce through the season but when Sandra, the groupie, comes out not even Tanika can hold the girls down. Suzie throws water on Sandra and pushes her off the stage.

episodes.name: Bitch Boo Bye
episodes.overview: Royce, Jen, Evelyne & Suzie return on Basketball Wives but with a few new faces. This season finds the ladies facing down old issues & new alike, with even more dramatic outbursts & heart rendering emotional moments than before.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Fallout over Suzie and Evelyn's argument has Suzie on the run to an unexpected source....GLORIA! Also, Tami reintroduces her daughters to father Kenny Anderson after many years apart.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Shaunie and the ladies launch a surprise ambush on Gloria to find out why her wedding was called off. Jen and Eric finally have "the talk" that will alter the course of their relationship forever.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When Evelyn and Jen finds themselves left off the guest list of a posh fundraiser thrown by circle outsider Ashley Walker, they decide to crash the event. Tempers flare when Tami and Jen get into it over an innocuous remark.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Evelyn and Jen regret volunteering to help Royce and her man Dwayne with a fashion fundraiser. Also, Tami has some surgery done, helping her to lose pounds and setting the stage to gain a friend.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Evelyn is back on the dating scene with a date that ends with a miss...and then one with a kiss. The tension between Jen & Eric reaches a new mark.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: With Royce at odds with Evelyn and Jen and Tami bent on preventing Evelyn from profiting off the hurtful phrase that launched their season-ending brawl, is it too late to make amends?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Suzie's return to the circle upsets Royce. Sparks fly when Tami takes Meeka to task for playing both sides.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Royce's father raises concerns about his daughter's new boyfriend. Also, Evelyn checks out a fertility clinic as she prepares to begin a family with Chad Ochocinco.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jen's curiosity and suspicions are piqued when Eric wants to take a meeting with Suzie. Also, more than mallets are swinging when Tami and Meeka get into it at an upscale polo event.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A trip to the Big Apple turns sour as Evelyn and Tami's beef over Ev's t-shirts resurfaces. Also, Jen agrees to her first date since splitting with Eric and Evelyn reconciles with her long-absent father.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Shaunie makes waves when she proposes another international girls' trip but excludes Royce from the guest list.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: It's an Italian vacation complete with extra baggage as Evelyn's reaction to a radio interview given by Jen threatens to end their friendship and Tami and Meeka butt heads over loose talk and leaving Royce behind.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The ladies' trip to Italy explodes as Tami's feud with Meeka reaches the boiling point, and one member of the circle calls it quits over the drama.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Royce's meeting with Eric makes Jen's blood boil, Chad surprises Evelyn with a unique outing, and Jen finds chemistry on a blind date set up by pal Al Reynolds.

episodes.name: Chad has lunch with another woman
episodes.overview: Evelyn catches Chad having lunch with another woman; Jen's divorce party heats up. Shaunie O'Neal, Suzie Ketcham, Jennifer Williams, Royce Reed.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Cast members reminisce. Shaunie O'Neal, Suzie Ketcham, Jennifer Williams, Royce Reed, Evelyn Lozada, Tami Roman, Meeka Claxton

episodes.name: Reunion (2) (Season Finale)
episodes.overview: In the second half of Season 3's Reunion Special, John Salley coaxes the ladies into dishing more dirt about their drama with Meeka and the status of Evelyn's relationship with Chad is also up for discussion.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Evelyn takes on the media for the first time after an altercation with her husband. Also, Tami tries to convince her to give the marriage a second chance.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Evelyn’s friend Tasha Marbury meets the ladies while Suzie and Tami’s insatiable curiosity about an old tabloid scandal makes waves.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The ladies deal with the fallout of Suzie’s grilling of Tasha Marbury. Also, Tami raises questions within the group by failing to show for Evelyn’s big birthday blowout.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Evelyn takes her issues with her ex to the therapist’s couch. Also, Tami expresses her displeasure with Shaunie "planting a bad seed" about her with Tasha.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Tasha's "headbutting" jokes land her and Suzie in hot water with Evelyn. Also, Shaunie tries her hand at producing a play.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tasha’s weave bar grand opening proves more hot mess than hot press. Also, Shaunie, Evelyn and Suzie’s early departure from Tasha’s birthday party leaves the birthday girl in a bad mood.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Tasha takes Shaunie, Suzie and Evelyn to task for leaving her birthday party but it’s what she asks Tami afterward that takes the cake. Also, Suzie and Tasha sprout their own feud after a hotel powwow.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Shaunie announces a girls’ trip to London Fashion Week that puts Evelyn’s clothing line plans into overdrive. Later, Shaunie's boxing date with Marlon leaves her feeling punchy.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: During a whirlwind week in London, Evelyn sweats her hastily arranged Fashion Week debut while the group comes together to help Tasha and Suzie squash their beef.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The ladies help Tasha go toe to toe with a woman who’s been posting about her husband online. Also, a surprise invitation to a Kenya Bell performance tests Suzie's patience.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Evelyn Lozada makes the move to LA and reunites with her best friend, Shaunie, and her old nemesis, Tami. At Shaunie's birthday party, tension between Evelyn, Tami, and Jackie threatens to boil over.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Evelyn and Jackie put their differences aside and move forward in their friendship. Later, Tami digs up new dirt on Evelyn in hopes of proving that she hasn’t changed; and newcomer Bonnie-Jill finds herself in the middle of some drama.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jackie throws a party to celebrate becoming a grandmother but a confrontation with Tami spoils the evening while Shaunie supports Evelyn as she begins her IVF treatment.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Shaunie attempts to broker a peace treaty between Tami and Evelyn. Jackie hosts a wine safari to bring her old and new friends together. Malaysia Pargo returns.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shaunie, Tami and Evelyn meet up with Jackie to find common ground; and Brandi Maxiell returns to L.A. Later, Evelyn celebrates good news about her IVF treatment by inviting the ladies to Palm Springs.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The ladies head to Palm Springs for a celebratory weekend. Later, Evelyn surprises Cristen with a makeover; and Malaysia invites a friend from the past to dinner, which pushes Shaunie, Tami and Evelyn over the edge.

episodes.name: Episode  7
episodes.overview: Jackie hears some information about Cristen which causes Tami and Evelyn to confront Cristen on whether or not she's been completely honest.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jackie throws her "love your body party" while Malaysia feels snubbed by Shaunie, Tami, and Evelyn. Cristen divides her friendship with Jackie.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Malaysia confronts Shaunie, Tami, and Evelyn on some boiling issues while Jackie and Bonnie-Jill have words that push Jackie to her limits.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: When Jackie finds out that Evelyn isn't happy with her, things come to a head with at a party that Evelyn throws for her magazine cover photos.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Tami suggests the ladies embark on a trip to New York City. While there, Evelyn takes Shaunie on a trip down memory lane in the Bronx and Jackie pushes Evelyn to her breaking point.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Tami hands over her "momager" roll when her daughter Jazz officially gets signed to a record label. Meanwhile, things go left when an uninvited guest makes an appearance at Saniy'yah's party.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jackie tries to broker a truce between Saniy'yah and Hazel; Jen Williams returns to the group; Evelyn and Jen speak to each other for the first time in seven years

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Recently single Evelyn shows off her revenge body; Tami stays busy with an appearance on "Wild 'N Out"; Malaysia brings in a new crew, Kristen Scott and Cece Gutierrez; Jen goes to court for a restraining order on her ex.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Evelyn grapples with a big decision regarding her frozen embryos; Tami is curious as to why Jen got so close to Evelyn after talking smack about her behind the scenes; and a rumor about Byron Scott's girlfriend, Cece, spreads.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The mood quickly shifts when CeCe has a spa day intended as a do-over with the women, and OG throws a party at which Tami and Jackie have a heated exchange with Evelyn.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The drama at OG's pool party compels Jackie to seek therapy, OG and Kristen butt heads, and Shaunie turns her marijuana dispensary into a family business.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Evelyn strengthens her friendship with Jennifer as she struggles through the final decision about her embryos, and CeCe dredges up old drama at Malaysia's wig party.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: OG and her man discover they're not seeing eye to eye on marriage. Malaysia tries to keep her family from tearing itself apart. An explosive rumor threatens to destroy a friendship within the group.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Shaunie launches an investigation into rumors that Evelyn was sleeping with her ex, CeCe and Byron set Malaysia up on a blind date, and Tami crosses a line in a confrontation.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Tami lashes out at Evelyn, leaving the entire group taking cover and taking sides. As an escape, Evelyn puts together a charity event, but Shaunie refuses to welcome Jen. Malaysia tries to get CeCe and Kristen past their conflict.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Jackie stars in a play, but her nerves threaten to get the best of her. OG deals with the death of her brother, the loss ultimately brings her and an enemy close. The Wives come out to support Jackie’s play, but there’s just as much drama off-stage.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The best friends featured in this series have more than mutual companionship in common: They are either the wife, ex-wife or girlfriend of an NBA superstar. Though they drive expensive cars, live in mansions and wear designer clothes and jewelry, life is not always glamorous. Protecting what they have takes a lot of work … like fending off groupies, dealing with the jealous kind and trying to find stable ground in their often unstable world. Shaunie…

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Evelyn’s trip to Puerto Rico becomes a more emotional experience than she bargained for. Jen enlists professional help to solve her love life issues. Malaysia has a difficult talk with her son. Jackie helps Reggie plan next step.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Malaysia attempts to face her fears and meets with a police officer. Tami’s cold feet about marriage get icier. Jackie hosts a premiere party for her Public Service Announcement.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: After her poor behavior at Jackie’s PSA event, Jen focuses on her love life. Kristen’s stress at home has her thinking twice about more children. CeCe and Kristen keep their distance from each other and Malaysia finds out the root of their issues is much deeper than she thought. Meanwhile, OG tries to spice up her relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Tami drops the bomb on Reggie that she wants to call off their engagement and fears he will end their relationship. Tension between Kristen and CeCe continues to build. Shaunie wants to boost her marijuana education with a trip to Amsterdam and invites the women, minus one.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Kristen and CeCe's family issues finally come to a head; Shaunie continues her weed research while the other women enjoy the sights of Amsterdam; Jen finally makes her arrival in Amsterdam, making sure to bring plenty of drama along.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Evelyn’s good intentions for bringing Jen to Amsterdam backfires. Jen’s presence in Amsterdam seems unwanted by some of the ladies and ignites a fire that no one could have expected. Malaysia reaches her breaking point and Evelyn hears rumors about her family that Jen has been spreading.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: It’s time for a ponderosa as the ladies sit down for the “Basketball Wives” reunion. They’ll rehash the drama from the past season, throw some new shade, and will give viewers two of the biggest surprises of the season.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Shaunie prepares for Shareef's surgery, Evelyn struggles with her health, Tami hides big news, Malaysia tries to help CeCe and Kristen move forward, and Jen stirs the pot.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Malaysia tries to broker peace between Kristen, CeCe and Londen, Tami's daughters are upset at her for eloping, and Jennifer comes face to face with Shaunie and Evelyn.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Tami opens up about her ex-husband's stroke, OG voices her opinion about Kristen and CeCe's attempt to mend their relationship, and things get heated between OG and Kristen.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: OG deals with the aftermath of her actions, Tami chooses a side, Shaunie finds a safe haven, CeCe threatens to sever ties with her blended family, and Malaysia seeks answers.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Someone is spreading rumors about Malaysia and her kids, and Jackie is determined to find out who, but the tables turn when all signs lead to Jackie as the culprit. OG and Cece reach a cross roads in their friendship when OG reads a nasty text.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: After a questionable photo-op, the ladies try to figure out where they all stand with Jennifer, Shaunie expands her business interests, and Tami makes a shocking announcement.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Tensions run high in Costa Rica when Cece gets mad at Evelyn for dredging up her family drama, Feby drunkenly rants at Jackie, and Jackie accuses Feby of being a drug addict.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The group's trip to Costa Rica is full of fireworks as Cece shows a different side, Jackie and Feby trade jabs, and OG starts a rumor about Evelyn's ex.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Shaunie is fed up with OG's constant threats of violence, Evelyn prints out some compromising DMs between OG and Chad, and Jackie is forced to choose sides.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 1
episodes.overview: Jennifer clears up what she said about Shaunie's relationship with her ex; Feby calls Jackie out on a lie; OG is forced to make a decision.

episodes.name: Reunion, Pt. 2
episodes.overview: Jackie attempts to prove her innocence, Malaysia and Jennifer face off, Shaunie discusses the impact of colorism, and one woman makes an unexpected exit.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Malaysia and Kristen's conversation with OG leaves the group wondering about the future of the sisterhood. Nia and OG spill some revealing tea about their relationship. Shaunie and Evelyn question their place in the group. And when things heat up, Jackie loses her cool.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Feby's arrival brings Evelyn back to the mansion, Jackie hopes a reggae fest can bring the ladies together, Nia and Feby work through their past issues, and OG loses her last ally.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Familiar faces returns for an extravagant wedding celebrations, but tensions threaten to derail it.

episodes.name: Episode 1002
episodes.overview: Duffey finds herself torn between choosing her DJ career or family.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jen works through grief and finds peace; tensions escalate when Duffey hosts a matchmaking event.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Angel throws a gender reveal party and is rattled when Nia makes an inappropriate joke; Jackie faces the consequences of meddling in Brittish's relationship with her ex-fiance; Jen opens herself up to love and is surprised by what she finds.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The women express concern for Angel’s relationship while cheating accusations rock the group. Jen is unsure if she wants to pursue anything with her new crush after an awkward first kiss. Brandi starts a passion project in her late father’s honor.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Duffey kicks off her birthday by inviting the ladies to her final performance in Vegas, but needs to reconcile with Angel; Brandi has to make a life-changing decision about her health; Brooke needs her kids' approval before beginning her IVF journey.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Duffey kicks off her birthday by inviting the ladies to her final performance in Vegas, but needs to reconcile with Angel; Brandi has to make a life-changing decision about her health; Brooke needs her kids’ approval before beginning her IVF journey

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: On the Vegas trip, tensions boil over as Nia attempts to apologize to Angel, but the other ladies aren’t convinced she is sincere; Duffey plays her last DJ set but has second thoughts about ending her career for good.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Malaysia and Brandi try to mend their friendship, but Brandi is still hesitant. While producing her first track, Duffey disagrees with Inman over her decision to continue DJing. The ladies go head-to-head at a basketball game soirée.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Jackie advances into her acting career and lands a movie role while Angel struggles with her high-risk pregnancy. Jen hosts an event to launch her luxury hair line, but Malaysia brings a guest that threatens her relationship with the other women.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jackie tries to lift the ladies’ spirits with a surprise trip; Brooke’s plans for IVF take a turn.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Emotions flare amongst the group as Brooke tries to wrestle control of the trip away from Jackie; a bewitching activity catches Brandi off guard; Brittish relies on the sisterhood for comfort as she struggles to cope with her recent arrest.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: As the Palm Spings trip concludes, Brooke and Jackie struggle to resolve their issues; Jen receives a surprise visitor and a starling proposal; Malaysia makes a decision about her family’s future; Angel enters the final days of her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: After a shocking discovery, Brooke finds her marriage in crisis; Jennifer takes a bold leap forward in her relationship with Jelani; Malaysia takes small steps returning to the sisterhood; Jackie feels offended when British calls out her meddling.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Jackie demands a ponderosa with the ladies to set the record straight; Brooke tries to sever ties with her husband; while Duffey and Imani encounter a relationship roadblock. Jennifer reveals a rumor about Malaysia which leaves everyone speechless.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Brittish suffers a major setback in her legal situation, while Brandi and Duffey find themselves at odds as growing tension reaches a boiling point; Jackie’s parenting skills are put to the test, and Malaysia makes a major decision about her future.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: British is devastated by the addition of her ankle monitor; reality sets in for Brooke as she officially files for divorce; Brandi and Duffey seek other support after their blow up at the winery; Angel struggles to juggle mom life.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Jen and Jackie's feud reaches new levels, and Duffey turns to therapy after her argument with Brandi;  Angel reaches her breaking point when Amani gets sick; Brittish hopes the women can find relief from the drama through alternative outlet.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Brooke's husband tries to dissuade her from divorcing him; Brittish accompanies Angel to a postpartum depression support group; tensions rise as Jackie hosts the women in Sacramento, Calif.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: A fun girls trip is derailed when Jennifer reaches a breaking point with Jackie's disrespect. Angel finds support in her fight with postpartum depression. A shady comment could mean the end of Brandi and Duffey's friendship

episodes.name: Back in the Building!
episodes.overview: Evelyn Lozada is back in the fold but when Brooke Bailey throws her a party there are mixed feelings in the group; when Jackie Christie introduces newcomer Vanessa Rider into the mix, a surprising personal vendetta is revealed.

episodes.name: Homewreckers
episodes.overview: Shaunie tries to broker peace between Evelyn and Vanessa; Evelyn gets cold feet in her relationship with Lavon; Brittany's motives are questioned after she is spotted out to dinner with Shaq; Jackie gets an unexpected olive branch by an old friend.

episodes.name: Ice Queens
episodes.overview: Brittany brings the wives ice skating for some wholesome fun, but her frustration over co-parenting causes a crack in her plan. vanessa faces off with Evelyn one-on-one. Brooke battles with her anger over the loss of her daughter

episodes.name: Who Are You, Where Did You Come From?
episodes.overview: Jen is skeptical when Clayanna invites her to lunch. When Lavon comes to town Evelyn is faces with having a tough conversation. Jen introduces younger boytoy, Christitan, to the women. Jac'Eil worries about the group dynamics.

episodes.name: Cooking with Fire
episodes.overview: Jac'Eil forms a bonds with Brittany's rival, Brooke. Evelyn struggles to balance loyalty to her daughter with her friendship with Jennifer, vanessa again puts her nose where it doesn't belong, and Jackie hatches a plan.

episodes.name: Turning Up The Heat
episodes.overview: Jackie brings the ladies on a healing trip to Arizona but it is unsure if everyone will come. Brittany begins to wonder if she started the body shaming with Brooke. And things take a turn for the worse at Brooke's birthday bash.

episodes.name: The Double Standard
episodes.overview: Jackie promotes healing with a trip to a Shaman. Brittany realizes there is a double standard while Evelyn and Jennifer rekindle their friendship. Clayanna tries to fix things with Jac'eil. Jennifer confronts Vanessa about inves.

episodes.name: Not So Magic Mike
episodes.overview: Brooke is in LA preparing for a fundraiser. Meanwhile in Arizona the other ladies head out to an all-male review for their last night shenanigans. The evening takes a turn when Jen throws shade at Clayanna. Brittany feels at odds.

episodes.name: Wrong Impressions
episodes.overview: Evelyn wants to support Vanessa but gets the wrong impression. Brittany goes on a blind date and distances herself from the group. Jac'Eil makes progress with her business. Lavon comes to town.

episodes.name: Pain to Purpose
episodes.overview: Brittany distances herself from the group. Brooke turns pain into purpose and finds herself growing close to her ex. As Vanessa's business endeavors come to a halt. And Evelyn works on her relationship.

episodes.name: Shop Til’ You Pop
episodes.overview: Evelyn throws a pop up for her fashion line. Jen’s boyfriend Christian checks Vanessa for gossiping about his kids. Brooke thinks about getting with her ex. Brittany makes a decision about her place in the group.

episodes.name: Love Lost & Love Found
episodes.overview: The ladies go to Houston, where Pastor Keion helps Evelyn gain clarity about her relationship with Lavon; Vanessa is met with opposition when her basketball gym dream becomes a reality; Jen is shocked when Christian pops the questions.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The ladies come together to hash out their differences that have been brewing all season. Evelyn and Brooke exchange words with Jackie. Brittany explains why she left early. And Clayanna is back to clean up some unfinished business.

episodes.name: A Liar’s Gonna Lie
episodes.overview: Jackie tries to mend relationships by planning a Ponderosa to unite everyone; Brandi quickly gets caught up in the ensuing drama.

episodes.name: Secrets, Lies and Private Yes
episodes.overview: Jackie surprises Jac'Eil with her past. Brooke finds out some possibly life changing news; Jennifer's wedding bliss turns into wedding stress; Brandi is not here for the BS; Evelyn investigates a frenemy.

episodes.name: Uninvited Guests, Unintended Consequences
episodes.overview: Unexpected guests threaten to upend the trip to Mexico; Brooke and Brandi's fight escalates; Jennifer's dream of a drama free vacation melts in the hot Mexican sun.

episodes.name: Don’t Call Me Sweetie
episodes.overview: Jac’Eil invites the girls to an LGBT charity event but unresolved tension between Brandi, Evelyn and Brooke threatens to ruin the day; meanwhile, as Jennifer and Christian’s wedding gets closer, Christian drops a bomb.

episodes.name: I’m A Sh*t Finisher
episodes.overview: Brandi and Brooke work to repair their friendship while Evelyn and Cheyenne's continues to blossom; Jackie resurfaces and chaos ensues at brunch; Jennifer tries to push her feature film forward to help with Christian's restitution payments.

episodes.name: This is Beneath Me
episodes.overview: Jennifer is on a mission to sell her movie and needs a drama free screening to do so, but her efforts may blow up in her face as tensions elevate to new levels during an event she hosts for the ladies.

episodes.name: She’s Not Worth Your Taco
episodes.overview: Brooke thinks it's time for her new man to meet her family; Jackie takes the next steps to make her talk show a reality; Shaunie comes to town to make peace between Jackie and the group.

episodes.name: Once a Cheater, Always a Cheater
episodes.overview: Jac'eils wedding day has arrived; Brandi's opinions on Brooke's relationship causes tension, while Brooke embraces her new chapter; Jennifer juggles wedding plans and movie premieres; Jackie connects with Shaunie to get the group back together.

episodes.name: Getting Messy in Mexico
episodes.overview: Unexpected guests threaten to upend the trip to Mexico; Brooke and Brandi's fight escalates; Jennifer's dream of a drama free vacation melts in the hot Mexican sun.

episodes.name: Shots Poured, Shots Fired
episodes.overview: Unexpected guests threaten to upend the trip to Mexico; Brooke and Brandi's fight escalates; Jennifer's dream of a drama free vacation melts in the hot Mexican sun.

episodes.name: You Can’t Even Spell Wife
episodes.overview: The ladies heal old wounds on their trip to Mexico until it's revealed someone on the trip played a role in one of Shaunie's relationships ending; accusations are thrown and breaking points are reached as the situation comes to a shocking climax.

episodes.name: Sisterhood of the Traveling Drama
episodes.overview: The ladies return to LA, Brandi and Jackie question if they can put their differences aside. Jackie’s talk show dreams become reality. A new obstacle leaves Jennifer’s wedding up in the air. Brandi’s marriage reaches a turning point.

episodes.name: The Reunion: Hot Mics and Spicy Drama
episodes.overview: The season is marked by tension and drama as old wounds are reopened; as the women confront their past, alliances are tested and rivalries reignited.
